sentences.sContent: Riding crop, monocle and bullhorn at the ready…!
sentences.sContent_eng: Riding crop, monocle and bullhorn at the ready…!
sentences.sCn: 马鞭，单片眼镜，扩音器全都准备好了…！

sentences.sContent: It's the verbal equivalent of wearing a monocle, or using an encyclopedia when Wikipedia is at your fingertips.
sentences.sContent_eng: It's the verbal equivalent of wearing a monocle, or using an encyclopedia when Wikipedia is at your fingertips.
sentences.sCn: 说这个词就像戴单片眼镜，或者明明指尖上就有维基百科却要查大百科全书。

remMethod.val: mon(单个的) + oc(眼睛) + le → 单片眼镜

trans.tranOther: a round piece of glass that you put in front of one eye to help you see better
